adDetails: I'm a professional hot tub / spa technician. I have 17 years of experience as a repairman in the hot tub / spa industry. I repair all makes and models. I also sell new hot tub covers. Here is a list of some of my services: *Repair/replace circuit boards *Repair/replace motors and pumps *Repair/replace controls and topside remotes. *Repair leaks in plumbing, jets, and shell *Repair/replace heaters *Repair/replace ozonators *Drain, clean, refill spa and add start up chemicals *Scheduled maintenance If you are looking for a professional repair technician, call the South Bay Water Tech today. www.southbaywatertech.com South Bay Water Tech show contact info Monte Sereno, San Jose, Almaden, Willow Glen, Evergreen, Los Gatos, Saratoga, Cupertino, Sunnyvale, Milpitas, Los Altos, San Francisco, San Mateo, Redwood City, Woodside, Palo Alto, Los Altos, Morgan Hill, Gilroy, Hollister
